com.ojcoleman.ahni.transcriber
Class HyperNEATTranscriberBainBase

java.lang.Object
  com.ojcoleman.ahni.transcriber.TranscriberAdaptor<T>
      com.ojcoleman.ahni.transcriber.HyperNEATTranscriber<BainNN>
          com.ojcoleman.ahni.transcriber.HyperNEATTranscriberBainBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transcriber<BainNN>, Configurable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ESHyperNEATTranscriberBain, HyperNEATTranscriberBain
public abstract class HyperNEATTranscriberBainBase
extends HyperNEATTranscriber<BainNN>

Base class for HyperNEAT-based transcribers that create BainNN neural network phenotypes. Includes a few useful methods for setting parameters for BainNN neurons and synapses.

Author:
Oliver Coleman

HyperNEATTranscriberBainBase

Method Detail

setNeuronParameters

protected void setNeuronParameters(double x,
                                   double y,
                                   double z,
                                   com.ojcoleman.bain.base.NeuronCollection neurons,
                                   int bainIndex,
                                   HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN cppn,
                                   boolean addNewConfig)
Set the parameters for a neuron, specifying the neuron coordinates directly (see HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN.setTargetCoordinates(double, double, double)).

Parameters:
x - The x coordinate, range should be [0, 1].
y - The y coordinate, range should be [0, 1].
z - The z coordinate, range should be [0, 1].
neurons - The neuron collection to set parameters for.
bainIndex - The index into the neuron collection to specify the neuron to set parameters for.
cppn - The CPPN to use to generate parameter values for the given neuron.
addNewConfig - Whether to add a new configuration object to the neuron collection (Set to TRUE if creating a new neuron collection).

setNeuronParameters

protected void setNeuronParameters(int x,
                                   int y,
                                   int z,
                                   com.ojcoleman.bain.base.NeuronCollection neurons,
                                   int bainIndex,
                                   HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN cppn,
                                   boolean addNewConfig)
Set the parameters for a neuron, specifying the neuron coordinates with grid indices into the substrate (see HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN.setTargetCoordinatesFromGridIndices(int, int, int)).

Parameters:
x - The index of the target neuron in the X dimension.
y - The index of the target neuron in the Y dimension.
z - The index of the target neuron in the Z dimension (the layer index).
neurons - The neuron collection to set parameters for.
bainIndex - The index into the neuron collection to specify the neuron to set parameters for.
cppn - The CPPN to use to generate parameter values for the given neuron.
addNewConfig - Whether to add a new configuration object to the neuron collection (Set to TRUE if creating a new neuron collection).

setNeuronParameters

protected void setNeuronParameters(Point point,
                                   com.ojcoleman.bain.base.NeuronCollection neurons,
                                   int bainIndex,
                                   HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN cppn,
                                   boolean addNewConfig)
Set the parameters for a neuron, specifying the neuron coordinates with a Point (see HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN.setTargetCoordinates(Point)).

Parameters:
point - The coordinates for the neuron.
neurons - The neuron collection to set parameters for.
bainIndex - The index into the neuron collection to specify the neuron to set parameters for.
cppn - The CPPN to use to generate parameter values for the given neuron.
addNewConfig - Whether to add a new configuration object to the neuron collection (Set to TRUE if creating a new neuron collection).

setNeuronParameters

public void setNeuronParameters(com.ojcoleman.bain.base.NeuronCollection neurons,
                                int bainIndex,
                                HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN cppn,
                                boolean addNewConfig)
Set the parameters for a neuron. NOTE: It is assumed that the source and target coordinates have already been set for the CPPN and that HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN.query() or one of the other query methods has been called.

Parameters:
neurons - The neuron collection to set parameters for.
bainIndex - The index into the neuron collection to specify the neuron to set parameters for.
cppn - The CPPN to use to generate parameter values for the given neuron.
addNewConfig - Whether to add a new configuration object to the neuron collection (Set to TRUE if creating a new neuron collection).

setSynapseParameters

public void setSynapseParameters(com.ojcoleman.bain.base.SynapseCollection synapses,
                                 int bainIndex,
                                 HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN cppn,
                                 boolean disabled,
                                 boolean addNewConfig)
Set the parameters for a synapse. NOTE: It is assumed that the source and target coordinates have already been set for the CPPN and that HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN.query() or one of the other query methods has been called.

Parameters:
synapses - The synapse collection to set parameters for.
bainIndex - The index into the synapse collection to specify the synapse to set parameters for.
cppn - The CPPN to use to generate parameter values for the given neuron.
disabled - Whether the synapse should be disabled (by setting the parameter specified by TranscriberAdaptor.synapseDisableParamName to 0).
addNewConfig - Whether to add a new configuration object to the synapse collection (Set to TRUE if creating a new synapse collection).
